text: Bidzina Ivanishvili (, also known as Boris Ivanishvili; born 18 February 1956)Wendell Steavenson, "The good oligarch" Prospect Magazine (21 July 2010). Retrieved 11 November 2011 is a Georgian businessman and politician. He became the Prime Minister of Georgia on 25 October 2012. He resigned his position as Prime Minister on 20 November 2013. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Georgia
title: Bidzina Ivanishvili
